choose.otherwise:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM video + status = #{status}
AND (title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR description LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%'))

mapper.select: SELECT v.id, v.title, v.description, v.video_path as videoPath, v.video_url as videoUrl, v.cover_path as coverPath, v.cover_url as coverUrl, v.duration, v.category, v.create_time as createTime, v.update_time as updateTime, v.tags FROM ( SELECT id, title COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as title, description COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as description, video_path COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as video_path, video_url COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as video_url, cover_path COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as cover_path, cover_url COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as cover_url, duration, category COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as category, create_time, update_time, tags COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci as tags FROM video WHERE id = #{id} ) v LIMIT 1
